name: PURULENCE: The Dark Tension
description:
Purulence: The Dark Tension is a prequel set 6 years before the events of the original game, and tells the story of the protagonist and what was the beginning of the events of the original Purulence. The game did not go far from the original idea. You will be greeted by an interesting storyline, quests and atmosphere. Author inspired by games such as: Gothic, The Elder Scrolls: Morrowind, Diablo and others

WARNING! The game contains only Russian!
